oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Empire de la Porte ottomane en Europe, en Asie et en Afrique avec les pays qui lui sont tributaires
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lotter Brothers (Firm)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Covers Egypt, the Arabian Peninsula, Israel, Lebanon, Syria, Iraq, Turkey, Greece, the Balkan Peninsula and Cyprus, and portions of Libya, Tunisia, Sudan, Iran, Azerbaijan, Georgia, Armenia, Russia and Italy.
Includes list of countries and ill.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Scale [ca. 1:9,000,000](W 14⁰35ʹ51ʺ--E 89⁰59ʹ39ʺ/N 57⁰32ʹ47ʺ--N 3⁰32ʹ03ʺ).

Turkey
